ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: i think you are overestimating the resist rate on this song.  i blasted both maestro and innoruk with this song up in hate a few weeks ago.  neither of them
ygData.messageBody:
i think you are overestimating the resist rate on this song. i blasted both maestro and innoruk
with this song up in hate a few weeks ago. neither of them resisted. i am/was level 55.

At 03:22 AM 2/22/01 -0500, you wrote:
>I don't see how this change does anything but make a worthless song worthless. If I'm trying to plug a
>3-foot hole in a dam with 3 sticks of chewing gum, handing me a fourth stick of gum doesn't help. I've
>memmed this song a few times in an attempt to find some song combination that could let me aggro the
>primary MOB; I have never once had it land for any damage. It is always resisted. Increasing zero by 25%
>still gives you, well, zero. Even if this were utterly resist-proof (and as a once every 40 minutes
>"desperate" song, I think it easily could be), it still does so little damage on a high-end MOB that you
>won't see the hit bar move. Why would anyone waste a song slot on this?
>
>I wouldn't care, except that Verant probably thinks they've done us a favor, and will count this towards
>their belief that we're "balanced". And if this is they way they're going to balance all the REST of the
>stuff, well....
>
>Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk
